name: sfr-gutenberg-lambda
description: A lambda to read epub records from the GITenberg project of Project Gutenberg and pass the resulting metadata to a Kinesis stream

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel index.js --out-dir dist && babel src --out-dir dist/src
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f ./config/dev.env -S config/event_sources_dev.json --handler dist/index.handler -P nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-qa: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e qa -f ./config/qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json --handler dist/index.handler
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f ./config/prod.env -S config/event_sources_prod.json --handler dist/index.handler -P nypl-digital-dev

author: Michael Benowitz
